mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Carillon is both a tower and a large scale musical instrument, one of a class of instruments which are the largest on earth. This 240-foot Georgian 56-bell tower is a memorial to Virginians who died fighting in World War I. -- http://www.richmondcitybook.com/carillon-bell-tower-richmond.php Added to National Register of Historic Places, October 4, 1984. [work]
